text: Real property or rent shall not be seized for a debt, as long as the present goods and chattels of the debtor are sufficient to pay it, and the debtor himself is ready to satisfy the debt.

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Limitation on seizure of real property.
